divs: Sighting DetailsPLEASE ERASE MY FIRST REPORT AND USE THIS ONE INSTEAD. THANK YOU! On the 11th, my husband called me from Sandy Springs Ga. and said he had been watching a bright starlike object in the sky. He said it was just hovering. I thought he was crazy! Well, the next night, the 12th, He called me outside our home in Atlanta Ga. and he showed me a bright light in the sky. He claims its the same object as the night before. I could not believe it. It was much larger than a star and much brighter. I went inside and got my camera and started taking pictures of it. As I was watching the object, it was as if someone turned the light off. It disappeared! I stood outside and watched and waited and about 15 minutes later the light was back. I started taking more pictures, as I noticed it was moving downward. I continued until it went out if sight.
Summary: A very bright light hovering in the sky.
